title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.34 - Safety or governor switch
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.34 - Safety or governor switch

State Regulations

All elevators using a traction type machine shall be
provided with a switch on the safety or governor, which will stop the machine
when the safety applies. Exception: Existing installations with mechanical
brakes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
